pullrequest.title: Add feature to write data to archives

content.raw:
I think what you are saying is correct only if we can assume that most of the errors will occur at the start of the first checked chromosomes and I don't think we can make this assumption. Otherwise bedtools is going to be a lot more faster in all other cases I bet.

Can someone confirm that the method __setitem__ here is called for every new interval? If this is correct then I guess speed is going to be a issue as the number of new interval increases.
content.html:
I think what you are saying is correct only if we can assume that most of the errors will occur at the start of the first checked chromosomes and I don't think we can make this assumption. Otherwise bedtools is going to be a lot more faster in all other cases I bet.

Can someone confirm that the method setitem here is called for every new interval? If this is correct then I guess speed is going to be a issue as the number of new interval increases.
